metadata.title: CVE-2017-13166 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel v4l2 video driver.Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-34624167.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-23-generic - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-23-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-23-lowlatency - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-23-snapdragon - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-23-generic - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-23-lowlatency - 4.15.0-23.25
No subscription required

No subscription required
